name: @ungap/template-tag-arguments
description: Normalizes tagged arguments granting a unique template

scripts.build: npm run cjs && npm run clean && npm run browser && npm run min && npm run size && npm test
scripts.browser: cp node_modules/@ungap/template-literal/index.js index.js && cat esm/index.js >> index.js && npm run fix
scripts.clean: sed -i.bck 's/(m => m.__esModule ? m.default : m)//' cjs/index.js && rm cjs/index.js.bck
scripts.fix: sed -i.bck "s/import unique from '@ungap\/template-literal';//;s/export default //;s/function (template)/function templateTagArguments(template)/;s/\[unique/\[templateLiteral/" index.js && rm index.js.bck
scripts.size: cat index.js | wc -c && cat min.js | wc -c && gzip -c9 min.js | wc -c && cat min.js | brotli | wc -c

author: Andrea Giammarchi
